perturbation.original_text:
World Book will submit invoices to HSWI for the Payments/Advances at least [*] ([*]) days prior to the
due date of such Payment/Advance, with the exception of the first payment which shall be due [*]. No
Royalty payments will be due until the amount of the Royalties exceed the amount of the
Payments/Advances described above for the development and delivery of the Affinities and Content
licensed hereunder, and then Royalties will only be owed for any Royalties in excess of the amount of
the Payments/Advances, as further detailed in the following Sub-Section.
perturbation.changed_text:
World Book will submit invoices to HSWI for the Payments/Advances at least [*] ([*]) days prior to the
due date of such Payment/Advance, with the exception of the first payment which shall be due [*]. No
Royalty payments will be due until World Book has delivered 75% of Affinities. No
Payments/Advances described above for the development and delivery of the Affinities and Content
licensed hereunder, and then Royalties will only be owed for any Royalties in excess of the amount of
the Payments/Advances, as further detailed in the following Sub-Section.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that royalty payments are not due until the amount of royalties exceeds the payments/advances, tying the payment obligation to royalty earnings. The modified text introduces a contradictory condition: royalty payments are not due until World Book has delivered 75% of Affinities. This creates a conflict because royalty payments could theoretically be due based on earnings before the 75% delivery milestone is reached or vice versa. This introduces uncertainty and potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
HSWI shall provide World Book on or before June 30th and
December 31st of each year with a list of third parties to whom sublicense hereunder has been made
during such semiannum.
perturbation.changed_text: HSWI shall provide World Book on or before June 30th of each year with a list of third parties to whom sublicense hereunder has been made during such semiannum. HSWI will also provide this list annually on March 15th to account for any residual agreements.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies two dates, June 30th and December 31st, for the delivery of the list of third parties. The modified text introduces a third conflicting date: March 15th. This creates confusion because the text states that HSWI will also provide this list, when in reality the third parties information list already exists.

perturbation.original_text:
Upon the expiration or termination of this Agreement, HSWI shall pay World
Book all amounts due and owing up to the date of termination, within [*] ([*]) days after such expiration or
termination.
perturbation.changed_text:
Upon the expiration or termination of this Agreement, HSWI shall pay World
Book all amounts due and owing up to the date of termination, within [*] ([*]) days after such written notification of expiration or
termination.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that HSWI shall pay World Book all amounts due within a certain number of days after the expiration or termination of the agreement. The modified text introduces a contradictory condition: royalty payments are paid after the written notification of expiration or termination, thus giving more time to HSWI.
